items.sentence: What's the most expensive piece of clothing you've ever bought?
About how much will it cost me to get to the airport from here?
I think that it's highly unlikely that Tom will drink any beer.
Do you think that Tom is strong enough to lift that by himself?
I think that there's a real good possibility of that happening.
Tom took a picture of himself on his phone and sent it to Mary.
Mary wrote her number on a piece of paper and handed it to Tom.
I wish that I could come up with a good answer to the question.
I used to think that it didn't really matter what I fed my dog.
I wish that we'd had time to visit you while we were in Boston.
I drove here from Boston as soon as I heard that you needed me.
I wish that I could explain to you how important this is to me.
Tom could feel the heat of the pizza through the cardboard box.
The box was crushed during transport and the contents flew out.
I know a woman whose first and last names are the same as mine.
I know it's highly unlikely anyone would be willing to help me.
I just want you to know I won't be able to come to your picnic.
I just want you to know I won't be able to attend your wedding.
Tom is pretty good at singing, but he's not a very good dancer.
Tom drank a Long Island iced tea and Mary drank a cosmopolitan.
You should've seen the look on Tom's face when Mary kissed him.
As the tigers approached, we wondered who would be eaten first.
You don't need to sound like a native speaker to be understood.
The coach told the players not to eat too much before the game.
It's because you work too much that you're sleepy all the time.
Even though Tom is thirty, he's still dependent on his parents.
I don't like swimming when there are a lot of jellyfish around.
Let's get up early tomorrow morning watch the sunrise together.
My car is in the shop, so I have to take the bus to work today.
You could see the entire city from the top of the Ferris wheel.
Were your eyelids stuck together when you woke up this morning?
What do you eat in the summer that you don't eat in the winter?
If I'd left a little earlier, I would've caught the last train.
You know that Tom will never let you live this down, don't you?
During his year of study abroad, Tom's French improved rapidly.
If you like Tom so much, why not break up with me and date him?
Tom grabbed the snow shovel and started shoveling the driveway.
He looked deeply into his crystal ball and predicted my future.
I want to make sure that I don't make the same mistake you did.
My siblings have left it to me to take care of my aging mother.
My friend ended up taking the rap for a crime he didn't commit.
There's nobody else I'd rather spend the weekend with than you.
Tom was riding a stolen motorcycle when the police stopped him.
If I'd known you were here, I'd have brought an extra sandwich.
I'm in a terrible mood today because I don't have enough money.
I'm going through my closet to find clothes to give to charity.
I'm not from around here, so I don't know much about this area.
There's no doubt that Tom was the one who stole your saxophone.
I hope that our new neighbors are friendlier than our old ones.
That was the first time that I'd ever eaten at that restaurant.
